title: file-update in shared folder from windows webdav-clients
body:
i'm using "webdrive" as webdav client in my windows 7 machine.

whenever i update or create a new file and save it in my own directory it works fine.

however, when i do the same and safe the file to a shared directory from somebody else i get the following message (in the shared directory all the access-rights are enabled):
"upload failed - unable to upload to \shared\foldername\filename
error=a backup of this file has been created".
even though i get this message the file is updated.
the same happens if i simply copy or move a file in win-explorer from a local directory to the webdav-directory ...

ok - the message text might be webdrive-specific, but there is something working in a different way depending on saving a file in my own or to a shared directory ...
